E

Enigma - class enigma.core.Enigma.
Provides general Enigma services, such wildcard expansion and Console creation.
enigma.console - package enigma.console
Provides text-mode support classes, most notably Console and TextWindow.
enigma.console.java2d - package enigma.console.java2d
Provides a pure-Java implementation of the TextWindow API using Swing and Java2D.
enigma.console.remote - package enigma.console.remote
An implementation of Console which allows its display to be sent over a network.
enigma.console.terminal - package enigma.console.terminal
Provides terminal emulation classes to be used with Console.
enigma.core - package enigma.core
Provides core Enigma classes used (knowingly or unknowingly) by every program running under Enigma.
enigma.event - package enigma.event
Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with events fired by Enigma components.
enigma.loaders - package enigma.loaders
Provides classes which allow programs of various types to be loaded and executed under Enigma.
enigma.shells.commandline - package enigma.shells.commandline
Contains the Enigma command-line shell, a console-mode program.
Environment - interface enigma.core.Environment.
Encapsulates state information about the currently-running application, such as its environment properties and current path.
escapeSequence - Variable in class enigma.console.terminal.AnsiOutputStream
The escape sequence currently being processed.
expandWildcards(String) - Static method in class enigma.core.Enigma
Expands a potentially-wildcard-containing path into an array of files.
